<xen:controlunit label="{$preparedOption.title}" explain="{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}">
<xen:checkbox> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_sidebar_latest_albums]" selected="{$value.forum_sidebar_latest_albums}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_latest_albums_on_sidebar}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_sidebar_random_albums]" selected="{$value.forum_sidebar_random_albums}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_random_albums_on_sidebar}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_sidebar_popular_albums]" selected="{$value.forum_sidebar_popular_albums}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_popular_albums_on_sidebar}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_list_latest_images_before]" selected="{$value.forum_list_latest_images_before}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_latest_images_on_forum_list_before_node_list}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_list_latest_images_below]" selected="{$value.forum_list_latest_images_below}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_latest_images_on_forum_list_below_node_list}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_list_random_images_before]" selected="{$value.forum_list_random_images_before}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_random_images_on_forum_list_before_node_list}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][forum_list_random_images_below]" selected="{$value.forum_list_random_images_below}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_random_images_on_forum_list_below_node_list}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][profile_tab]" selected="{$value.profile_tab}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_profile_tab}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][member_card]" selected="{$value.member_card}">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_member_card}</xen:option> </xen:checkbox>
<input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:controlunit>

option.edit_format_params: oldest=Oldest at the top newest=Newest at the top

option.sub_options: forum_sidebar_latest_albums forum_sidebar_random_albums forum_sidebar_popular_albums forum_list_latest_images_before forum_list_latest_images_below forum_list_random_images_before forum_list_random_images_below profile_tab member_card

phrases.phrase: This controls the maximum number of albums that will be shown on one page.
How many albums can user create. Set 0 to allow user create an unlimited amount of albums.
The number of characters that will be used to create the album preview when hovering over the title. Use 0 to disable the preview.
Set images count you want to display in latest images block and random images block.
Select available locations you want information to appear that is outside of the albums area.
Show empty albums at main album list
If this option enabled, users, who have permissions to see empty albums, will see empty albums at main album list.
You can hide menu tab from guests by enabling this option, even if guests have permission to view albums.
The maximum allowed dimensions for uploaded images (width x height). Use 0 or blank to not restrict dimensions.
List the file extensions that are allowed to be uploaded. Use spaces or line break between extensions.
Provide the maximum image file size in kilobytes (KB). Images over this size will be rejected.
How many images can be uploaded into album. Set 0 to allow an unlimited amount of images.
You can select table or grid album list type here.
Controls how many recent comment links are displayed.
Using the Flash uploader allows those visitors with Adobe Flash installed to select multiple files to upload once, and to see a progress meter during the upload.
The maximum width and height of generated image thumbnails.
Controls the appearance of the cover image of the album.
Controls the width of the album cover cell.
Controls the width of the statistics cell.
Path the the icon shown if album has no cover image.
This is used to enclose the description text.
This element contains the content area of the album or image description.
This styles thumbnail holder for moderated albums in grid layout.
This styles thumbnail holder for private albums in grid layout.
Styles different elements of user albums pages
Albums are being stored in file system. Please confirm the path to these.
{user} has posted a comment on your image in the album {title}.
{user} has posted a comment on the image you have commented too in the album {title}.
Archived import log table name not entered.
Enter archived import log table name from previous import.
You can not create a new album since the album limit for a single user reached.
You can not upload images since the limit for images per album reached.
Image cannot be shown at this time.
Image could not be read by server.
Latest albums on the forum sidebar
{username} commented on the image in the album {album}.
{username} added {newImages} new image(s) to his album {album}.
No one has liked this album yet.
No one has liked this image yet.
Please enter reason for reporting this comment.
Please, enter reason for reporting this image.
Popular albums on the forum sidebar
Random albums on the forum sidebar
Someone comments on a image that you have commented on
Someone posts a comment on one of your images
Sorry, you have no permission to create album.
Thank you for reporting this comment.
Thank you for reporting this image
There are no images yet in this album.
This album is awaiting moderator approval and is invisible to normal visitors.
{username} liked your image in the album {title}.
Your images were uploaded and saved.
You have no albums yet, but you can create a new one.
You may not upload more images to this album.
You must upload at least one image.
Are you sure you want to like this album?
Are you sure you want to like this image?
Are you sure you want to unlike this album?
Are you sure you want to unlike this image?

property.title: Album Cover Cell Width
property.description: Controls the width of the album cover cell.

property.title: Stats Cell Width
property.description: Controls the width of the statistics cell.

property.title: Album Cover Image
property.description: Controls the appearance of the cover image of the album.

property.title: Default Cover Icon Path
property.description: Path the the icon shown if album has no cover image.

property.title: Description Container
property.description: This element contains the content area of the album or image description.

property.title: Description Content
property.description: This is used to enclose the description text.

property.title: Grid view: Private
property.description: This styles thumbnail holder for private albums in grid layout.

property.title: Grid view: Moderated
property.description: This styles thumbnail holder for moderated albums in grid layout.

group.title: [xfr] User Albums
group.description: Styles different elements of user albums pages

templates.template:
{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_news_feed_item_comment_insert, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'album={xen:string censor, $content.title}'}

{xen:helper snippet, $content.message, 100, {xen:array 'stripQuote=1'}}

{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_news_feed_item_image_insert, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'newImages={$extra.newImages}', 'album={xen:string censor, $content.title}'}

{xen:helper snippet, $content.description, 100}

{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_news_feed_item_album_create, 'username={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}'}

{xen:string censor, $content.title}

{xen:helper snippet, $content.description, 100}

{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_x_liked_your_album_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'title={$content.title}'} {xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_x_liked_ys_album__z, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'primaryText'}', 'posterParams=href="{xen:link useralbums/view, $content}"', 'poster={$content.username}', 'title={$content.title}'}

{xen:helper snippet, $content.message, 100, {xen:array 'stripQuote=1'}}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_add_delete_images}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_add_delete_images}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$breadCrumbs" /> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'useralbums/save-images', $album}" method="post" class="xenForm AutoValidator" data-redirect="on" > <fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><xen:include template="xfr_useralbums_image_upload_button" /></dd> </dl>
<xen:if is="{$imageParams}"> <dl class="ctrlUnit AttachedFilesUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_uploader">{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_uploaded_images}:</label></dt> <dd><xen:include template="xfr_useralbums_image_editor" /></dd> </dl> </xen:if> </fieldset>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase save}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl> <input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{$album.title} - {xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_unlike_album}', '{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_like_album}'}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_unlike_album}', '{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_like_album}'}</xen:h1>

<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_edit_image_comment_by_user, 'user={$comment.username}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$breadCrumbs"/> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'useralbums/comment-save', $comment}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase message}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" class="textCtrl Elastic" rows="2">{$comment.message}</textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd> <input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase save_changes}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /> </dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>

<xen:title>{$comment.title} - {xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_report_comment}</xen:title> <xen:h1>{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_report_comment}</xen:h1>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$breadCrumbs" /> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'useralbums/comment-report', $comment}" method="post" class="xenForm formOverlay AutoValidator">
<dl class="ctrlUnit"> <dt><label for="ctrl_message">{xen:phrase report_reason}:</label></dt> <dd><textarea name="message" id="ctrl_message" rows="2" class="textCtrl Elastic"></textarea></dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:phrase xfr_useralbums_report_comment}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
